page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE - BOY
page.content: I start my weekday at 7 am when I dress for school and have a wash. After breakfast and a hot drink (usually coffee),I watch T.V., and just before I go to school at 8 am I get my books ready, and my games kit (if needed). When I come home from school at about 4 pm , I usually clean the bar (I live in a pub),which means cleaning the glasses and floor and polishing the tables. Most evenings I go cycling for an hour or two before doing my homework. When the bar opens at 7 pm I usually help behind the bar for an hour before completing any unfinished homework. The rest of the evening is all mine and I usually spend it watching T.V.
